description: Difference between number of nonprimes and primes in reduced residue system of primorial numbers.
example: n=4, Q(4)=2*3*5*7=210, reduced residue system includes 48 terms:42 primes and 6 composites and 1: a(4)=6-42=-36.
author: _Labos Elemer_
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Max Alekseyev_, Feb 22 2016
